project.name: C-C765B-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C765B-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are names of either FIFO files or regular files, and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains non alpha-numeric characters, spawn two threads underscores, spawn two threads. Using a sem_post before ever calling sem_wait causes the counting semaphore to allow two processes into the critical section instead of just one when the previous process unblocks. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have non-alphanumeric characters it.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 9680 -s 141 -m "1 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 hephalump!" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
